claims.object: Synchronic Development of Vascular and Nervous Systems

surface_layer.definition: The communication between the nervous and vascular systems, often regulated by common molecules.

deep_layer.mechanism: Involves common guiding cues and developmental processes.
deep_layer.origin: Necessary for the coordinated development and function of the nervous and vascular systems.

epistemic_metadata.source: Neurovascular crosstalk coordinates the central nervous system ...
